DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate long-term safety efficacy pregabalin patient chronic neuropathic pain .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Long-Term Safety Efficacy Pregabalin Patients With Chronic Neuropathic Pain .
DOC.criteria: Must meet inclusion criterion precede doubleblind BID study diabetic neuropathy postherpetic neuralgia . Must receive study medication doubleblind condition . Patients participate experience serious adverse event previous doubleblind BID study determine related study medication .
